h2_title: How to Use the Five Skandhas
img_above_text:
# Foothills Walkthrough

This will include Hound, Jackal, and Eagle Soldiers, as well as the tougher looker variants with shields called Captain of the Court.

As you get closer to the first Keeper's Shrine of the area, you'll see a large group of soldiers appear. Clear these out and then you can activate the shrine.

Be sure to check the Shrine Shop while you're here, and revisit the Zodiac Village to see what new items everyone has to offer.

Mount Huaguo Shrine Shop
| Mount Huaguo Shrine Shop            | Mount Huaguo Shrine Shop              | Mount Huaguo Shrine Shop            | Mount Huaguo Shrine Shop       |
| ----------------------------------- | ------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------- | ------------------------------ |
| Body-Cooling Powder (x6) - 180 Will | Shock-Quelling Powder (x6) - 180 Will | Tonifying Decoction (x3) - 360 Will |                                |
| Mind Core (x6) - 3000 Will          | Find Gold Thread (x2) - 3000 Will     | Celestial Ribbon (x1) - 9000 Will   | Gold Tree Core (x1) - 4500 Wil |


Now drop down from the Feng-Tail General and activate the nearby Keeper's Shrine. You'll see a field straight in front of you that's strewn with soldiers and fire. Before you head here, let's go find the second optional Poison Chief miniboss that's nearby.


As you get close to the edge of the cliff, you'll find another clearing with a rock in the middle. This is the third Poison Chief in the region.

When you've beaten the third Poison Chief, head over to the start of the red trees. As you enter the clearing with the lightning, you'll find the next Keeper's Shrine on the left.


When it's defeated, head back along the river and look for the golden tree.


After defeating the boss, climb the arm that touches the ground and you'll meet the monkey again. Let the cutscene play and you'll get the Skandha of Consciousness.

## How to Use the Five Skandhas

With all five in your inventory, go to Xu Dog and deliver the Skandhas. You'll then have the option to tell Xu Dog to make the Five Skandhas Pill. Receiving this will boost your health, mana, and stamina.
img_below_text: Now it's time to head back to almost where you fought the Son of Stones. We mentioned earlier the clearing with the water and the big rock with golden trees on either side. Instead of going right, where you fought the Giant Shigandang, you now want to go left.

img_summary:
Preceding Text Summary:
The preceding text describes a walkthrough of the Foothills area, focusing on combat encounters, shrine activations, and item collection. Players are guided to defeat enemies, activate Keeper's Shrines, and explore locations like the Mount Huaguo Shrine Shop for items. The narrative also introduces the acquisition of the Skandha of Consciousness after defeating a boss and interacting with a monkey character.

Image Summary:
The image depicts a scenic, mountainous landscape with dense vegetation, rocky cliffs, and a clearing below. A character, seemingly airborne on a cloud-like platform, is positioned in the foreground, overlooking the area. A red arrow points toward a cliffside path, suggesting a direction for progression or exploration. The image serves as a visual guide for navigating the area described in the walkthrough.

Following Text Summary:
The following text continues the walkthrough, directing players to return to a previously mentioned location near the clearing with water and golden trees. Players are instructed to take a different path leading left instead of right, advancing toward new objectives and encounters.
